answers.answer: I think if your hands are swollen enough to feel stiff/sore then that is considered excessive.  You should probably let your dr know.

question: I had preeclampsia with my first and second pregnancy so I know the things to watch out for, but my question is what is excessive swelling?? I woke up this morning with swollen, stiff hands and swollen feet but I'm not sure if this would be considered as excessive or not. I'm 25 wks 6 days.
title: Swelling
